text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (Huh? Is that the ceiling?)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Finally awake, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: McQueen? Are we in the infirmary?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I noticed you were particularly<n>absorbed in your work as of
late, but I<n>never thought you'd actually<n>collapse.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Looks like the stress got to me more<n>than I thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Let's be grateful that it was just<n>fatigue. Now... care to tell
me what<n>work was so important that you<n>ended up
collapsing?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I just... wanted to find a way to<n>guarantee Suzuka's
success.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Her success?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Correct me if I'm wrong, but the<n>Suzuka I know is not
cause for such<n>concern... Is that truly the reason?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Well, I do want to make sure shesucceeds... But that's because I'mafraid of what happens if her bodyfails...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: All right, all right. The truth is...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: All right, all right. The truth is...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The risk of Suzuka's running style...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She runs amazingly—like a dream!<n>Even I get chills thinking
about what<n>we'll see at her next race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But... what if that running is doing<n>harm to her body? I'd
hate to see her<n>future stolen from her by an accident.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But... what if that running is doing<n>harm to her body? I'd
hate to see her<n>future stolen from her by an accident.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But that's the worst-case scenario.<n>You seem so certain
that this will<n>happen.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'm not doing anything that would<n>guarantee it, but... I can't
find anything<n>that would prevent it either.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I'm not doing anything that would<n>guarantee it, but... I can't
find anything<n>that would prevent it either.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well then, why don't we start by<n>taking a nice, deep
breath?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: McQueen...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Trainer... I don't think such an unlikely<n>scenario is worth
your concern.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Surely you've heard this before, no?<n>We Umamusume run
carrying the<n>hopes and dreams of others.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, Agnes Tachyon mentioned the<n>same thing when I
talked to her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No matter how hard you work for<n>your dreams, there comes
a time<n>when you feel you cannot proceed<n>any further.
Sometimes it's a physical<n>problem, and sometimes<n>
psychological.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
"I can't go on." "This is the end." I<n>can't tell you how often
I've had<n>those thoughts... I'm sure my<n>teammates have
all felt the same.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However, overcoming limitations is<n>another part of being an
Umamusume.<n>And by doing so, we challenge the<n>notion
that such limitations existed in<n>the first place.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As long as we have the hopes and<n>dreams of our
supporters,<n>Umamusume are limitless.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If you need proof, you needn't look<n>any further than your
own journey.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wait, me?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wait, me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
When each of your trainees fell on<n>hard times, who was it
that picked<n>them up? As we took off towards our<n>dreams,
who pointed us towards the<n>finish line?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If it weren't for you and the<n>unconditional support you
offered us,<n>none of us would be who we are<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In fact, I would say you've helped us<n>achieve more than we
could have<n>ever imagined.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To think that you would dedicate<n>everything, just for me... I
am truly<n>grateful.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But despite that, I will shoulder your<n>hopes and keep
running—as your<n>team's ace!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I want to win too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And I want to make them smile today.<n>So I'm going to give
this race my all.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I wanna win! It's always been my<n>dream! I'm scared, but I
can't quit<n>now! URAAAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Totally! And we'll run them all<n>together! Let's go for it! To
what's<n>beyond the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: With all this support, I refuse to yield.<n>Victory is mine.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but I'm not going to stop here.<n>My urge to run is what
I'll use to<n>propel me forward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even if your path with Suzuka does<n>hit her limit, it will be all
right. I'm sure<n>you'll find a way forward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of all the hopes and dreams<n>propelling her forward, I'm
sure yours<n>are some of the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even when the way forward was<n>blocked, McQueen and
the others all<n>managed to break through and make<n>their
dreams come true.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And that's because I was there to<n>offer them a final push
as they tore<n>down those barriers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And that's because I was there to<n>offer them a final push
as they tore<n>down those barriers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, then I shouldn't be<n>sitting around making
Suzuka anxious.<n>Instead...
choice_data_list: I need to take in the scenery Suzuka shows me!
I need to take in the scenery Suzuka shows me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If that's the case, then I shouldn't be<n>sitting around making
Suzuka anxious.<n>Instead...
choice_data_list: I need to take in the scenery Suzuka shows me!
I need to take in the scenery Suzuka shows me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She should be running on the training<n>track. I suggest you
go give her the<n>same push you gave us.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka believed in me enough<n>to join our team.
Since then, we've<n>been on this path together, racing<n>
towards the scenery of her dreams.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka believed in me enough<n>to join our team.
Since then, we've<n>been on this path together, racing<n>
towards the scenery of her dreams.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But somewhere along the line, my<n>eyes wandered... I
started to worry<n>about her ability to run—about things<n>that
had not yet happened.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But somewhere along the line, my<n>eyes wandered... I
started to worry<n>about her ability to run—about things<n>that
had not yet happened.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka, I'm so sorry.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka, I'm so sorry.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I've been teaching you all about<n>running techniques and
different<n>training methods, but I forgot the most<n>important
lesson I can give you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I've been teaching you all about<n>running techniques and
different<n>training methods, but I forgot the most<n>important
lesson I can give you.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And what would... that be?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Every time I watch you run, I can see<n>you coming into your
own as a racer.<n>And every time, my heart swells with<n>
anticipation.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Every time I watch you run, I can see<n>you coming into your
own as a racer.<n>And every time, my heart swells with<n>
anticipation.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But so do my fears. I worry that your<n>body won't be able to
handle the<n>strain.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
But so do my fears. I worry that your<n>body won't be able to
handle the<n>strain.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And over time, I let those fears grow<n>bigger and bigger, to
the point where I<n>obsessed over a made-up scenario.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And over time, I let those fears grow<n>bigger and bigger, to
the point where I<n>obsessed over a made-up scenario.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I see, so that's why you looked so<n>anxious. You were
concerned for my<n>well-being...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but now I realize that those<n>worries are proof that I
didn't trust<n>you enough. I didn't believe you<n>could keep
running.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but now I realize that those<n>worries are proof that I
didn't trust<n>you enough. I didn't believe you<n>could keep
running.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka... No matter how long or short<n>our journey may be, I
want to be<n>there for you. I want to see you catch<n>up to that
scenery you seek, just like<n>we promised!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka... No matter how long or short<n>our journey may be, I
want to be<n>there for you. I want to see you catch<n>up to that
scenery you seek, just like<n>we promised!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
In order to make that happen, all I can<n>do—and all I need to
do—is believe in<n>you! So please...
